name: The Lost Shards of Time
description:
Dedicated to Pooja: wishes for a quick and grief-free recovery.

A puzzle platformer where you control two characters in seeming opposite dimension to help each other solve problems, find shards, and repair their magical mirror before they lose themselves forever!

Controls: A / D  --- left/ right input. SPACE --- jump. S --- phase through stairs   E --- pickup / interact / throw  TAB -- swap control

Medieval themed sprites obtained from the Unity Asset Store; Various sound effect from Freesound.org (Full list in README.txt)
